conversation.text: I want to watch a horror movie.

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM

Certainly! Here are two highly recommended horror movies:

1. "The Ring" (2002) - This Japanese horror movie follows a young woman who discovers that she has inherited the cursed "Ring."

2. "Saw" (2004) - This American horror movie revolves around a group of people who are held captive and forced to participate in twisted games.

Both "The Ring" and "Saw" are highly acclaimed horror movies that are sure to give you the chills!
